entries.title_d: Capture the escaping starfighter, Admiral Kilnstrider wants the pilot for questioning.
entries.title: Endor System: Fox and the Hound
entries.thanks_3: How do I get myself into these things.
entries.thanks_2: I won't talk, you can't make me talk.
entries.thanks_1: They will send more, you won't get away.
entries.taunt_2: You underestimate the conviction of our Rebel fighters.
entries.taunt_1: We can't let them take you alive.
entries.target_disabled: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 The target is disabled, approach to begin capture protocol. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.split_quest_alert_fail: \#pcontrast3 Endor Station: < \#pcontrast1 Jump signatures show them coming out near Isryn's Veil in the Dantooine System.  Proceed with best haste and you may still catch them. And I may overlook this current failure. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.split_quest_alert: \#pcontrast3 Endor Station: < \#pcontrast1 Jump signatures show them coming out near Isryn's Veil in the Dantooine System.  Proceed with best haste and you may still catch them. And I may overlook this current failure. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.recovery_success: \#pcontrast3 Endor Station: < \#pcontrast1 I have control of the ship now Captain.  The Admiral sends his thanks and I have been authorized to present a mercenary bonus for this operation. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.quest_recover_d: Fly up next to the disabled craft and the recovery process will begin.  When this process ends the ship will repair itself and move out to an egress point.
entries.quest_location_d: An escape route near the suspicious nebula.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the captured starfighter to the Endor Station, protecting against retributive attacks by Rebel forces.
entries.quest_disable_d: Cycle through the targets components with the default [ or ] keys until you select their engines or reactor.  Fire on the target until one of these components and you are notified that the target has been disabled.
entries.panic_3: It doesn't have to be this way!
entries.panic_2: Get him, get him... save me, save me!
entries.failed_escape: \#pcontrast3 Kilnstrider: < \#pcontrast1 It is unfortunate to find such incompetence infesting our navy. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_destroy: \#pcontrast3 Kilnstrider: < \#pcontrast1 It is unfortunate to find such incompetence infesting our navy. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.escort_wiped_out: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 All escorting craft have been destroyed. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.escort_remaining: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 And escorting craft has been destroyed, %DI remain. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.complete: \#pcontrast3 Kilnstrider: < \#pcontrast1 Good work Captain, I will take personal pleasure in extracting the information we need from this pilot about what they are doing in this system.  Kilnstrider out. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.capture_phase_2: You know, we really don't have to go through all of this trouble.
entries.capture_phase_1: Hey, I'm just an innocent bystander here... why don't you just let me go.
entries.autorewardbody: By the authority of < Admiral Kilnstrider > you have been awarded a credit bonus to the sum of < 20000 > for < Capture of a Rebel operative>
entries.attack_stopped: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Hostile actions has ceased. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Hostile craft detected on attack vector. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.arrival_phase_2: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Target has been locked in. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.arrival_phase_1: \#pcontrast3 Kilnstrider: < \#pcontrast1 Get moving Captain, we do not want that ship to escape. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.abort: I thank you for your incompetence Imperial dog.
